title: How The Man Behind The Trailers Sparks An Urge To See A Movie
teaser: Mark Woollen has created trailers for many Oscar-nominated films, including Boyhood, The Theory of Everything and Birdman. He talks about how he crafts an audience's first glimpse of a film.
